segments.text: I'm watching the children in the kitchen, and they're quite busy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The little boy is balanced on a stool, his arm stretched high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's expertly reaching into the cookie jar, I can clearly see the label.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister stands beside him, her small hand open, ready to receive.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a shared anticipation in their postures.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're working together for a common goal: cookies!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a charming little moment of childhood conspiracy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel happy seeing their determined faces.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is totally unaware of their delicious plan.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just focused on her dish towel and plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole setup, with the open cabinet, frames their secret operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic scene of innocent mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get to enjoy their cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR
